name: Ginst - Gravity Instrument
description:
Extraordinary music game which uses your phone's G-sensor data as input parameters for note pitch and player positioning.
Learning to play music can be fun, inspiring, time consuming, but one thing is certain – it’s never easy. It is necessary to choose the appropriate instrument, to spend money and time for music classes and to ensure patience for everything ahead. Not anymore.
Thanks to the intuitive interface, Ginst allows you to easily master the basics of playing, the easiest way – just enjoy the game.
Whether you are a beginner who only ever listened and watched others play an instrument or a professional looking for a new musical challenge, Ginst is the right choice for you.
Whether you use the mobile phone version where your mobile phone becomes a musical instrument, or a version designed for personal computers where music magic begins with the Vayu controller, this is your chance to turn your movements into music.
Enjoy our original music themes.
Ginst - the right move for your ears.

GAME BASICS
Use your mobile G sensor as Note Pitch to get the right tone. Tap when note enters hexagonal keyboard to play the instrument.

GAME MODES
Arcade - Master your skills through a series of tutorial and songs. Every song you play, unlocks Quick Play, Multiplayer and Free-play.
Quick Play - Play your song in three mode Lead, Bass, Percussive. Change your difficulty:
* Easy - just tap with left and right thumbs to produce note sound when note hits hexagonal keyboard
* Medium - use G sensor on your phone to get the right pitch position. Playing range is larger to help catching the notes.
* Hard - Same as medium, but Playing range is exactly one note pitch.
* Expert - Play your song with G sensor on your phone with no visual data. You must use right move for your ears :) .
Free Play - Import your favorite midi songs, take your instrument, select track to play and enjoy harmony.
* Musician - Play your music with moving your phone in freestyle. Use G sensor and specific thumbs moves to make polyphony.
Multiplayer - Play Ginst with your friends in local network. Select Lead, Bass or Percussive track for every player. Play your instruments and songs with your band.
Preview - Watch and listen. See how our AI plays songs and learn.
Musical Instruments - You can change your musical instrument and play every mode with your desired sound.
